MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have attempted to replace a blown fuse and established an underground cable fault affecting Caledonian Road and surrounding streets. Due to the extent of the repairs that are now required, we expect your supply to be restored by 10:00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:30pm on Monday, 4th January 2021.
